about_the_game:
Sun Meiqi is a plot-oriented puzzle game set in the 1990s in China, where the player takes on the role of a police detective, "Liu Youth", as the core force of justice, solving cases and defeating various evil organizations. The game consists of a number of independent cases, which together create a very rich story. By the end of summer 2022, there have been nine consecutive seasons, each season consists of six separate games (DLC). Each DLC has an approximate play time of one hour. The first seven seasons of the game were developed by the Unity engine and debuted on the AppStore, but will now be developed using the Unreal engine and debut on the Steam platform.

Sun Miki Suspicion 2021


The Sun Miki Suspense 2021 is a collection of the Sun Miki Suspense series released in 2021
It contains the complete sixth and seventh seasons, as well as the first episode of the eighth season and a special episode
Specifically includes
Season 6
S06E01:The Man at the Bottom of the Well
S06E02:Antique Shop
S06E03:Ghostbusters
S06E04:12
S06E05:The Floating Life
S06E06:The Stone Gate Village Tragedy
Season 7
S07E01:Yin and Yang
S07E02:The Stone Gate
S07E03:Adverse Journey
S07E04:Phantom
S07E05:Fragments of Memory
S07E06:The Compulsion of Chaos
Eighth Season
S08E01:Vanishing
Special Episode
Captivity

Game features


  • Rich scenery and 1990s local nostalgia

Each individual case takes place in a distinctive location, with carefully designed scenery and objects. 90's China is familiar and unfamiliar, and you'll feel especially close to it. As the cases continue, you will be treated to a complete look at China in the 80s and 90s. They will include: homes and lodges, temples and ancient buildings, public spaces, transportation, and any location you have ever thought of.

  • Separate but continuous episodes and continuous updates

Each case is a stand-alone game that can be played in any order, and you can enter the Sunmatch universe from any case (DLC), and the exciting plot will be continuously updated, and you can get the latest information (trailers and new clues) through Steam or other media!

  • The core gameplay of scene exploration, puzzle solving, and deduction correlation

Carefully designed scenes with a series of objects furnished, organs, puzzles, you can search for evidence in the process to understand the plot, reasoning and correlation is the core gameplay of the Sun Miki suspect case, as a detective, you must master the skills of reasoning!

Season 1 Plot Summary


This is the inaugural season and the game is set in Beijing around the 1990s. A secret room murder case occurred at Sun Meiqi's house in Building 2 of the Changzhuang district, and criminal police officer Liu Youth is in charge of the case for investigation. With his extraordinary powers of observation and the information provided by Sun Meiqi's family and neighbors, he solved the murder case with layers of forensic evidence. At the same time, he also discovered the ulterior motive of Sun Meiqi's neighbors. He is determined to pursue the truth and embarks on a train to Moscow, and the Bureau also sends Interpol officer Wang Yong to help investigate the case in Beijing.

Season 2 Synopsis


Liu Youth received several more cases after returning to Beijing, each seemingly independent, but in fact all connected. One by one, the masterminds behind the crime surface. With the help of Suidong, Liu Youth also discovers that an ancient organization is still alive today, threatening the safety of many people, including himself. There are too many mysteries waiting for him to solve, and on the way to find out the truth and justice, Liu Youth, has just started his journey.

Season 3 Synopsis


Liu youth and Wang Yong together to explore the case! Someone to revenge to blow up Liu youth, together with the detective Wang Yong watched Liu youth location explosion, but in the rubble can not find his body, Liu youth missing! Afterwards, when Wang Yong was investigating Lin Yongxin's case in Foshan, someone said that he saw Liu Youth at the scene of the murder. In fact, Liu Youth did not die, but he did get kidnapped, a woman named Golden Phoenix, fell in love with Liu Youth, in several dark organizations want Liu Youth's life, Golden Phoenix to keep him alive and help him. But, did Liu Youth kill anyone or not?

Season 4 Synopsis


This season tells the story of Wang Yong in Liu Youth investigation at the same time, he was sent to investigate some cases, Qiang Feng laboratory secretly do what experiments also gradually clear. Wang Yong also accidentally got a message from the mystery man, and later discovered the true nature of a person with the help of the mystery man. And Liu Youth side, his brother was killed, naturally will not stop there, according to the Golden Phoenix's instructions to go to Xinjiang alone, was brought to the Uyghur girl Hado, learned a multitude of information about the Kauryuktag. When he rushed back to Beijing, the police department is also about to undergo a radical change, in the end what happened? What's going on?

Season 5 Synopsis


This season's plot is a flashback, so players can run through the timeline in reverse order.
Liu Youth rushes to Anhui to investigate the case because the deceased died in exactly the same way as Sun Meiqi and found a token from the South Study, which is related to his brother's death. After layers of investigation finally found that there was a mole in the police department, the director Chen Shuangzhi's office actually exploded, and it was all arranged. Liu youth experienced suspension and reinstatement, after so much experience, he understands that he can only carry the weight forward.
This season there is a newcomer, - police Nanhe.

Season 6 Synopsis


Season 6 is from the perspective of Nan He. Nan He came to Hong Kong, one to solve the case, the other is entrusted by his sister to pick up something, not expecting that the antique store hides a major secret behind, and it has something to do with what his sister asked to find. Nan He found a magical device, walked into it and had a dream, in which there was his father and what happened to his father in the battlefield back then, and these things are all connected. Nan He decided to go back to Beijing to find Liu Youth and tell him about this encounter, and he needs Liu Youth's help. After returning to the capital, Liu Youth has a case at hand, so he took Nan He together with the stone gate village to investigate the case.

Season 7 Synopsis


This season the female police Hadow perspective also made an appearance! At the same time the new mysterious organization also made an appearance. Liu youth, Nanhe, Haduo three people help each other to trace the case of the stone gate village. Follow the stone door Liu youth went to the ancient tomb and the morgue, saw the floating dream. And Nan He has been looking for his sister's whereabouts, finally met a man named Luo Bin, told him where Nan Sister, but the strange words of this man caught Nan He's attention. Hadow was ordered by the director to go to the Miao Village in Guizhou, where Hadow but found the whereabouts of the head of the organization, sorted out everything and ready to report to his superiors and continue to investigate in depth.

About me

Yes, all the development work is done by me independently, please tolerate some flaws, if possible Sun Meiqi detective universe will always be updated.

name: MeiQi 2021

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2100 @ 3.10 GHz/ AMD FX-4100 @ 3.60 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4430 @ 3 GHz/ AMD FX-8370 @ 3.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 770 2GB/ ATI® Radeon™ R9 270 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: The MeiQi Series is an episodic mystery game. This collection contains all of Season6 and 7,which will be released in 2021,as well as the first episode of Season 8 and a special episode. In total there are 14 chapters. The story continues with the new police officer NanHe and policewoman Haduo.
